settings.title: Bank of America Preferred Rewards Inquiry

settings.html: Artwork: Surfside Good Day by Lumi Emily Forbes

settings.heading: Receive $550 credit toward artwork and support diverse artists

settings.text:
ArtLifting advances access to the art market by connecting artists with disabilities to socially conscious customers, creating meaningful spaces and products.

Receive a special one-time gift of $550 on behalf of Bank of America Preferred Rewards to be used toward any ArtLifting print.


  • Select from over 5000 artworks created by emerging contemporary artists.
  • Multiple sizes and framing options available. Printed and framed in the USA. Shipped directly to your home or office ready to hang.
  • Every purchase creates financial resilience for artists with disabilities. From your purchase, 55% profits benefit artists directly, and 1% is donated to ArtLifting Community Impact Fund, which supports art supplies for art programs and individual artists.
  • Cannot be combined with other offers. Excludes original artwork, ArtLifting products, services, shipping, and products sold by ArtLifting partners. Offer has no cash value and cannot be given away or transferred.

Click here to learn more about ArtLifting artists and explore the artwork catalog. When you are ready to redeem your offer, contact the ArtLifting team using the following form to get started.


Please specify which artwork is of interest. If unsure, provide information to help make a recommendation:

  • Do you have an ArtLifting artist you like?
  • What is your preferred artwork style? (Muted, Abstract, Photography, Minimalist, Bright, Landscape, etc.)
  • What colors do you like or dislike?
  • How large is the space you are considering for this artwork?
